Verses: 1 paskaa Pandigaikku Munne, Yesu Ivvulagaththai Vittup Pidhaavinidaththirkup Pogumpadiyaana Thammudaiya Velai Vandhadhendru Arindhu, Thaam Ivvulagaththilirukkira Thammudaiyavargalidaththil Anbuvaiththapadiye, Mudivupariyandhamum Avargalidaththil Anbuvaiththaar.
2 seemonin Kumaaranaagiya Yoodhaaskaariyoththu Avaraik Kaattikkodukkumpadi Pisaasaanavan Avan Irudhayaththaith Thoondinapinbu, Avargal Bojanampannikkondirukkaiyil;
3 thammudaiya Kaiyil Pidhaa Ellaavatraiyum Oppukkoduththaarenbadhaiyum, Thaam Dhevanidaththilirundhu Vandhadhaiyum, Dhevanidaththirkup Pogiradhaiyum Yesu Arindhu;
4 pojanaththai Vittezhundhu, Vasthirangalaich Kazhatrivaiththu, Oru Seelaiyai Eduththu, Araiyile Kattikkondu,
5 pinbu Paaththiraththil Thanneerai Vaarththu, Seesharudaiya Kaalgalaik Kazhuvavum, Thaam Kattikkondirundha Seelaiyinaal Thudaikkavum Thodanginaar.
6 avar Seemon Pedhuruvinidaththil Vandhapodhu, Avan Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Neer En Kaalgalaik Kazhuvalaamaa Endraan.
7 yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Seygiradhu Innadhendru Ippozhudhu Nee Ariyaai, Inimel Arivaai Endraar.
8 pedhuru Avarai Nokki: Neer Orukkaalum En Kaalgalaik Kazhuvappadaadhu Endraan. Yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Unnaik Kazhuvaavittaal Ennidaththil Unakkup Pangillai Endraar.
9 adharku Seemon Pedhuru: Aandavare, En Kaalgalaimaaththiramalla, En Kaigalaiyum En Thalaiyaiyumkooda Kazhuvavendum Endraan.

10 yesu Avanai Nokki: Muzhuginavan Than Kaalgalaimaaththiram Kazhuvavendiyadhaayirukkum, Matrappadi Avan Muzhuvadhum Suththamaayirukkiraan; Neengal Suththamaayirukkireergal; Aagilum Ellaarum Alla Endraar.
11 thammaik Kaattikkodukkiravanai Avar Arindhirundhapadiyinaal Neengalellaarum Suththamullavargal Alla Endraar.
12 avargaludaiya Kaalgalai Avar Kazhuvinapinbu, Thammudaiya Vasthirangalaith Thariththukkondu, Thirumba Utkaarndhu, Avargalai Nokki: Naan Ungalukku Seydhadhai Arindhirukkireergalaa?
13 neengal Ennaip Podhagarendrum, Aandavarendrum Sollugireergal. Neengal Sollugiradhu Sariye, Naan Avardhaan.
14 aandavarum Podhagarumaagiya Naane Ungal Kaalgalaik Kazhuvinadhundaanaal, Neengalum Oruvarudaiya Kaalgalai Oruvar Kazhuvakkadaveergal.
15 naan Ungalukku Seydhadhupola Neengalum Seyyumpadi Ungalukku Maadhiriyaik Kaanbiththen.
16 meyyaagave Meyyaagave Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren, Oozhiyakkaaran Than Ejamaanilum Periyavanalla, Anuppappattavan Thannai Anuppinavarilum Periyavanalla.
17 neengal Ivaigalai Arindhirukkirapadiyinaal, Ivaigalai Seyveergalaanaal, Baakkiyavaangalaayiruppeergal.
18 ungalellaaraiyunkuriththu Naan Pesavillai, Naan Therindhukondavargalai Ariven; Aagilum Vedhavaakkiyam Niraiveraththakkadhaaga, Ennudane Appam Pusikkiravan Enmel Than Kudhikaalaith Thookkinaan.
19 adhu Nadakkumbodhu Naane Avarendru Neengal Visuvaasikkumporuttu, Ippozhudhu Adhu Nadappadharku Munname Adhai Ungalukku Sollugiren.
20 naan Anuppugiravanai Etrukkolgiravan Ennai Etrukkollugiraan, Ennai Etrukkollugiravan Ennai Anuppinavarai Etrukkollugiraan Endru, Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
21 yesu Ivaigalai Sonnapinbu, Aaviyile Kalangi: Ungalil Oruvan Ennaik Kaattikkoduppaan Endru, Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endru Saatchiyaaga Sonnaar.
22 appozhudhu Yaaraikkuriththup Pesugiraaro Endru Seeshargal Aiyappattu, Oruvaraiyoruvar Nokkippaarththaargal.
23 andha Samayaththil Avarudaiya Seesharil Yesuvukku Anbaanavanaayirundha Oruvan Yesuvin Maarbile Saaindhukondirundhaan
24 yaaraikkuriththu Sollugiraarendru Visaarikkumpadi Seemonpedhuru Avanukku Saigaikaattinaan.
25 appozhudhu Avan Yesuvin Maarbile Saaindhukondu: Aandavare, Avan Yaar Endraan.
26 yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Indhath Thunikkaiyaith Thoiththu Evanukkuk Koduppeno Avandhaan Endru Solli, Thunikkaiyaith Thoiththu, Seemon Kumaaranaagiya Yoodhaaskaariyoththukkuk Koduththaar.
27 andhath Thunikkaiyai Avan Vaanginapinbu, Saaththaan Avanukkul Pugundhaan. Appozhudhu Yesu Avanai Nokki: Nee Seygiradhai Seekkiramaai Sey Endraar.
28 avar Ippadi Avanudane Sonnadhin Karuththaip Pandhiyirundhavargalil Oruvanum Ariyavillai.

29 yoodhaas Panappaiyai Vaiththukkondirundhapadiyinaal, Avan Poi, Pandigaikkuth Thevaiyaanavaigalaik Kollumpadikkaavadhu, Thariththirarukku Edhaagilum Kodukkumpadikkaavadhu, Yesu Avanudane Solliyiruppaar Endru Silar Ninaiththaargal.
30 avan Andhath Thunikkaiyai Vaanginavudane Purappattupponaan; Appozhudhu Raakkaalamaayirundhadhu.
31 avan Purappattupponapinbu Yesu: Ippozhudhu Manushakumaaran Magimaippadugiraar, Dhevanum Avaril Magimaippadugiraar.
32 dhevan Avaril Magimaippattirundhaal, Dhevan Avaraith Thammil Magimaippaduththuvaar, Seekkiramaai Avarai Magimaippaduththuvaar.

33 pillaigale, Innum Konjakkaalam Naan Ungaludanekooda Iruppen, Neengal Ennaith Theduveergal; Aanaalum Naan Pogira Idaththukku Neengal Varakkoodaadhendru Naan Yoodharode Sonnadhupola Ippozhudhu Ungalodum Sollugiren.
34 neengal Oruvariloruvar Anbaayirungal; Naan Ungalil Anbaayirundhadhupola Neengalum Oruvariloruvar Anbaayirungal Engira Pudhidhaana Kattalaiyai Ungalukkuk Kodukkiren.
35 neengal Oruvariloruvar Anbullavargalaayirundhaal, Adhinaal Neengal Ennudaiya Seeshargalendru Ellaarum Arindhukolvaargal Endraar.

36 seemonpedhuru Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Neer Enge Pogireer Endraan. Yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Pogira Idaththukku Ippozhudhu Nee En Pinne Varakkoodaadhu, Pirpaadu En Pinne Varuvaai Endraar.
37 pedhuru Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Naan Ippozhudhu Umakkup Pinne En Varakkoodaadhu? Umakkaaga En Jeevanaiyum Koduppen Endraan.
38 yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Enakkaaga Un Jeevanaik Koduppaayo? Seval Koovugiradharku Munne Nee Ennai Moondrudharam Marudhalippaayendru, Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Unakku Sollugiren Endraar.
